attributes.action: Compel the energy companies to reduce gas and electricity prices to reflect the fall in the oil price.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The energy companies are always quick to say that gas prices are linked to the price of oil. With oil prices now below $50 a barrel, and the lowest since 2005 energy prices should also be back at the 2005 rates.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
